Create an eco-friendly insect trap by filling a container with stale beer or cola. Insects would be attracted to the container by the scent of the liquids and would eventually meet their demise.
Planting plants that naturally repel insects such as marigolds or basil, or using companion planting, can naturally repel insects.

Building an insect-proof barrier around your home by sealing cracks and crevices where insects can enter, placing a mesh screen over windows and doors, or using weather stripping around doors and windows, can keep insects out.
Implementing a regular cleaning and sanitation regime in the home, including eliminating moisture sources where insects may be drawn, can aid in the elimination of pests.
Using a vacuum cleaner or hand pump to eliminate insects and their nests can be an effective approach of getting rid of them.
